title: A call for designers
content:
just a bit of fun really. i wrote this typesetting tool in processing. id like you to have a play with it and send me your creations via email. ill then post up a compilation of everyones work

heres the link -

[http://gbtype.wordpress.com/2009/10/18/interactivity/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106214150/http:/gbtype.wordpress.com/2009/10/18/interactivity/ "http://gbtype.wordpress.com/2009/10/18/interactivity/")

have fun!
author: Michael Green
